list.title: BaseMap
list.description: Manages multiple WMS sources used as Itowns ColoLayer for background

list.title: BaseMap#changeVisibleLayer
list.description: It makes the layer with the given ID visible and hides all the other layers

list.title: BaseMap#createLayers
list.description: Create a WMSSource and an Itowns ColorLayer from each baseMapLayer. The first added is visible.

list.title: BaseMap#displayLayersImage
list.description: Display in the widget an image of the Layer, referenced in the field layer.id. It can either be an external URL or an image in the asset folder
